replies.body: Omg, that conversation between the champions is probably the best thing I have seen Riot do for a skin release {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
**_DO NOT CLICK ON THE MESSAGE IT IS A HACK AND WILL LEAD TO YOUR ACCOUNT TO GET HACKED_**

sorry but that is bullshit. I recommend scanning websites with AV and virustotal and use proper logic. Also it works without any login/pw information. If you feel annoyed for whatever reason, go play a coop vs AI or something..

There is nothing wrong with it


P.S. Link leads to facebook anyway, how dangerous can that be.. kids these days l0l
if they dont ask for password, they still ask for phone number and user name, just as bad.
Who knew that {{champion:105}} could do that?
That video was the best 47 hours of my life{{champion:105}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:68}}
This is the cringiest thing I have ever seen
I was just asking, If this ends at May 31 then does that mean the super galaxy skins are going to become legacies? Or is the bundle just gonna be gone?
rito you think you flew over our heads with that gurren lagann reference, but i caught you big boy, you ain`t slick (but still cool reference).
That you for making the reference to Neon Strike Vi.
I never knew fizz was so...well... let's say enthusiastic about his self.
If that is how they sound in game, I'm leaving. Rumble is already intolerable.
